about_the_game:
"From the vast dark, the aliens have come! There is no hope of survival! But if you must go, you go fighting!"

Fight a hopeless battle against an attacking alien race. There is no hope of victory, only to take as many enemies down with you, as you can!

Alien Fury is an arcade space shooter that gets progressively harder, the longer you play.
It's a simple a matter of shooting the alien missiles, before they hit you.
How long can you survive?

It was made for the Steam Deck, but is highly playable on desktop as well.
It's also a showcase of my homemade SkullForge game engine, and it's coded 100% in C++.

Enjoy!

Odin Strabo Jensen
